逃出熔炉 Out of the Furnace (2013)

导演: 斯科特·库珀
编剧: 斯科特·库珀 / 布拉德·英格尔斯比
主演: 克里斯蒂安·贝尔 / 佐伊·索尔达娜 / 伍迪·哈里森 / 威廉·达福 / 福里斯特·惠特克 / 卡西·阿弗莱克 / 山姆·夏普德 / 波伊德·霍布鲁克 / 丹德里·泰勒 / 汤姆·鲍尔 / 马克·库布尔 / 汤米·拉菲特 / Gordon Michaels / Jack Erdie / Efka Kvaraciejus
类型: 惊悚
语言: 英语
上映日期: 2013-11-27(美国) / 2013-11-27(英国)

预告片：

剧情简介：

影片讲述了贝尔饰演的主人公罗塞尔·贝兹（Russell Baze）在经历了四年牢狱被释放后，发现自己的弟弟（卡西·阿弗莱克饰）被残忍地谋杀了。为了复仇，罗塞尔踏上了追踪杀手的历程。佐伊·索尔达娜饰演罗塞尔的爱情对象，山姆·夏普德出演贝兹兄弟的叔叔。

Out of the Furnace is an upcoming American thriller film, directed by Scott Cooper, from a screenplay written by Cooper and Brad Ingelsby, and produced by Ridley Scott and Leonardo DiCaprio. This is a second collaboration between Scott and DiCaprio, as they collaborated for the first time on Body of Lies. The film stars Christian Bale, Forest Whitaker, Woody Harrelson, Casey Affleck and Zoe Saldana, and tells the story of two brothers from an economically depressed mill town in the Rust Belt. The elder brother lands in prison, while the younger becomes involved with a violent Northeastern crime syndicate. Relativity Media is producing the film which will receive a limited release in the U.S. on November 27, 2013, followed by a wider theatrical release on December 6.
